biography.placeOfBirth: A mutant relocation camp in an undisclosed location on an alternate 21st Century Earth

work.occupation: (current) Adventurer, (former) Commander in the XSE (Xavier's Security Enforcers)
work.base: Formerly Xavier Institute for Higher Learning, Salem Center, Westchester County, New York

connections.groupAffiliation: "Clean City"; formerly Stryfe; X-Men; X.S.E. (Storm's team); X-Treme X-Men; X.S.E. (Hecate'e's team); The Twelve
connections.relatives: Burnum Bishop (father, deceased), Kadee Bishop (mother, deceased), Shard (sister, deceased), unnamed grandmother, Gateway (great-grandfather), Aliyah Bishop (alternate reality daughter);
